author: {'steamid': '76561198355991599', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1088, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1022, 'last_played': 1710650245}
review:
Jesus Christ, I haven't even gotten to the other glitches mentioned in the review but in the bonus chapter I got stuck in a dead loop of Hint:Go To Forest Portal -> move to another stage with no idea where to go -> Hint:Go To Forest Portal. The forest portal had been long since cleared out at this point.

Also in the main Golden Age game the prince is still pretty damn racist and complains whenever he has to make the Smallest Amount Of Effort. I think maybe it's not a good thing when you want to enact violence upon a companion every time you see them - and you see them for the entire game.

Really disappointed honestly? Puzzles in both were pretty mid but the other games were so much better (save for the centaur village one - Redleaf?). At the LEAST, they were SIGNIFICANTLY more functional.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128995597', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 263, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 263, 'last_played': 1692422802}
review: You cannot finish this game, it's broken. If you like the Awakening series, do not purchase this. It's a prequel spinoff, and not a very good one at that. The puzzles aren't even good enough to be a saving grace.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054042604', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 375, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 375, 'last_played': 1672874294}
review: Like so many before said, there is a bug in the bonus chapter, which causes the game to not respond anymore. The game is almost 6 years old, and not fixed, it's a shame, I really enjoyed the Awakening series. And up until that bug I thourougly enjoyed the bonus chapter. I bought it as a whole pack, and can't play it, which I'm sad about.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969267147', 'num_games_owned': 7582, 'num_reviews': 572, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1670196890}
review: This is [I]Awakening[/I] #8, a prequel to the whole series. It seems to have been developed by a different team and plays quite differently. Unfortunately, despite absolutely stunning graphics it is not a great game. For one, it is very, very short. It is also very easy, too easy I would say. Finally, it is buggy: I hit a game-breaking bug in the bonus chapter that would not let me finish the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010655799', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 341, 'last_played': 1647242548}
review: It's ok, until bug. Then it's bad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198353705522', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 925, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 924, 'last_played': 1708373107}
review: Whilst the main part of the game is enjoyable, when playing the bonus game  a glitch occurred when trying to pick up a mold near the end, as this is an intrinsic item that unless you have it you cannot proceed, it renders the bonus game not worth playing. This glitch has been known for some years according to other players and the game maker has refused to address it, that is why I would not recommend this game and was grateful II got it at a reduced price. I will not be purchasing any other games from this maker.

author: {'steamid': '76561198428682670', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 187, 'last_played': 1701232493}
review:
This game is horrible

Bugs aside, this has the weakest, most generic story with almost zero ties to the original and the worst, ugliest animation out of the Awakening series' games. It also has terrible guidance, where the hint bird will keep telling you to go to the same area when there's absolutely nothing to do. One bug I found was that I was still able to use the hint even though Fives (my bird) wasn't hatched nor was his egg found at that point

Amazing, Big Fish, really giving us the most highest koala tea games

Redleaf Forest had the CGI dragon, which I can turn a blind eye to since he dies immediately after (the mechanical dragon, not the orange boi), but here almost everything is either CGI or a singular frame

I guess what I'm trying to say is

I hate this beyond words

author: {'steamid': '76561199097017582', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 289, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 289, 'last_played': 1638288833}
review: The bonus chapter is so glitched out and has been since 2017 so honestly don't play if u don't wanna feel unsatisfied. Like it just sucks that it's not finish-able and has been for years

author: {'steamid': '76561198142676085', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1637326042}
review: Even though it's a prequel to the main series, it has the same charm and atmosphere, and a gorgeous artstyle and animations. The only downside is that in this version of the game there's a bug that makes it impossible to complete the bonus chapter, because there are certain key items that are impossible to pick up.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990107032', 'num_games_owned': 588, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 330, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 330, 'last_played': 1607978436}
review: Bonus Chapter has a game stopping glitch which means you are blocked from several achievements and cannot finish the story

author: {'steamid': '76561197998030235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1607516926}
review:
I've enjoyed the Awakening series since [i]Awakening: The Dreamless Castle[/i], and this game continues the tradition gorgeous artwork, soft music, and light puzzles the series has had.

However, [i]Awakening: The Golden Age[/i] game is pretty much a standalone title from the overall series. It's a prequel to the series, but doesn't connect with Sophia's story aside from a brief mention in the bonus chapter. I found this a bit disappointing as [i]Awakening: The Redleaf Forest[/i] had a good setup for more sequels at the end.

Speaking of the bonus chapter, as others have said, it is a part of the game that can't be completed. This is due to a progression-stopping bug that prevents picking up a crucial item that's needed to move things forward. This game was released in February, 2017, and more than three years later, the bug is still not patched. It seems to affect only the Steam version, however, as someone in the discussions mentioned they were able to contact customer support for Big Fish Games and were allowed to download the game through their client where the bug didn't exist.

Overall, this is one game in the series I can't recommend, especially due to the progression-stopping bug. Considering it's also a prequel to the series and doesn't really tie into the main story, it's not something that needs to be played to understand the original story.

author: {'steamid': '76561198330672663', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 512, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 243, 'last_played': 1660847329}
review:
Episode Prequel
Bon jeu, bonne histoire, mini-jeux. Durée 3 heures hors chapitre bonus.
Attention : dans le chapitre bonus il y a un bug qui empêche de terminer (un objet qu'on ne peut pas prendre). Bug connu et signalé apparemment depuis 2017 et non corrigé, c'est pourquoi je mets un pouce rouge. C'est d'autant plus dommage que ce chapitre est plutôt sympa avec une bonne histoire, et plutôt long (j'ai bloqué au bout d'une heure).
Ceci dit, jeu acheté dans le bundle des 7 épisodes, donc pas de regret quand même.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056884555', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 936, 'last_played': 1605035817}
review: Game has a glitch, (Cannot pick up Steel mold), I have checked forums and it looks like it was first reported n 2017. The glitch stops you from completing the bonus game. Would have thought that it would have been sorted by now, I expect Steam to at least have working games for download. If anyone knows of a work around it would be helpful.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972117896', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1582262725}
review: Can't finish the bonus game because there is a software bug in it where you can't select a form you need. This has been a known problem for three years and it is still being sold. Boomzap for me is not one of the preferred HOG designers. Selection of items is very picky. Hints are broken in this game - always points you to one place no mater where you are in the game once you reach that point.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088535177', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 90, 'playtime_forever': 337, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 337, 'last_played': 1578177951}
review: I enjoyed this game, in fact I enjoyed the entire series, however, there is a glitch in the bonus chapter and you cannot finish it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198885991318', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1579038658}
review: 跟觉醒的其他系列不同，这部所谓前传很显然是由其他游戏公司制作，因为画面，人物互动和过场动画质量都十分差，无法与前五部相提并论。剧情跳跃难以理解，游戏中提示不充分容易卡关，小游戏又多又繁琐。就算是用一般解谜游戏的标准来评价的话也属于中下等，其内容与质量无法与价格相匹配，建议不要购买。

author: {'steamid': '76561198293227795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 255, 'last_played': 1560888218}
review:
WARNUNG auch von mir: Das Bonuskapitel ist leider verbuggt.

Ich bin großer Fan der Hauptreihe und hab mich auf das neue Spiel gefreut. Die Story, die vor der Hauptreihe angesiedelt ist, ist gut erzählt, die Charaktere mochte ich sofort. Das Setting mit den fantastischen Szenerien und dem riesigen Baum ist toll.
Die Rätsel sind gut, die HOP-Szenen machen Spaß.

Ich vermisse allerdings meinen Pocket-Dragon! Auch wenn`s dafür einen andren Drachen zu sehen gibt und uns ein Vogel begleitet.

Alles in allem ist das Spiel aber gut, weshalb ich es empfehle. Ich habe den Kauf nicht bereut und das Spiel bis zu diesem leidlichen Bug genossen.
Trotzdem sollte man es eher bei einer Rabattaktion kaufen, da - wie gesagt - das Bonuskapitel nicht funzt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198321329416', 'num_games_owned': 520, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 249, 'last_played': 1548610508}

author: {'steamid': '76561198026294253', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 371, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 371, 'last_played': 1514801717}
review:
Warning: There is a game stopping bug in the bonus chapter where you cannot pick up one of the objects needed to complete the game. You can click it all you want but nothing happens. Shame, as I was truely enjoying the game up until I couldn't pick up the mold from the closet with the shovel in it even though there is absolutely nothing else I can do. Clicking 'hint' tells me to go to that closet. Clicking 'hint' while in that closet tells me there is nothing to be done there. It's just broken.

If you do buy the game anyway, note that the game actually is pretty good, so as long as you don't play the bonus chapter, where the game breaking bug is, you should enjoy it, except for the fact you can't get all the in-game achievements without completeing the bonus chapter. So yeah, I can't recommend this one until the publishers fix it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161500621', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 212, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1627059264}
